translation: From whatever cause the restless and unsteady mind wanders away, let him restrain it from that and bring it under the control of the Self alone.
commentary: 6.26 Because because from whatever cause? Nischarti wanders away? Mind mind? Restless restless? unsteady unsteady? Then from that? Regular having restrained? This this? Atmani in the Self? Eve alone? Vasham (under) control? Nayet let (him) bring.Commentary In this verse the Lord gives the method to control the mind.
